Name: Space Mercenary Defense Force
About the game: Defend the planet from an invasion of alien monsters in this sci-fi action roguelike! Combine Different Ship Modules Each Run Kit out your ship's directional module slots with a variety of offensive and defensive upgrades. Choose from options such as the Breaching Laser Cannon, Ion Blaster, Space Hook, and Repulsion Defense. With a range of options to choose from, you can create your own unique and interesting builds to blast away the alien invasion. Choose Your Own Upgrade Paths Every upgrade has it's own unique progression, many of which include branching paths. Choose your own progression through options such as varied targeting, increased impact vs. increased radius, scatter or burst shots vs. increased size or damage, and many more! Make each run your own with a selection of over 190 total upgrades to choose from. Permanent Unlocks And Upgrades Earn credits after each run to unlock new ships with different stats and directional module slots to change the way you play. Credits can also be spent on permanent stacking upgrades for your ship such as increased stats or unique effects like deploying AoE beacons on level up.
